idea-plugin.name: Branch Name in Title
idea-plugin.description:
Displays the current Git branch name in the window title bar.

This plugin helps you easily identify which branch you're working on when switching between multiple project windows.

Features:
  • Shows Git branch name in window title
  • Automatically updates when switching branches
  • Supports multiple project windows
  • Handles detached HEAD state
